recipes.author: chefadmin
recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.short_desc: Classic British dish with tender beef and mushroom duxelles
recipes.long_desc: A showstopping centerpiece for any special occasion, this Beef Wellington features tender beef fillet wrapped in mushroom duxelles, prosciutto, and flaky puff pastry. The key is cooking the beef perfectly and ensuring the pastry is golden brown and crisp.

recipes.author: bakingqueen
recipes.title: Red Velvet Cake
recipes.short_desc: Classic Southern cake with cream cheese frosting
recipes.long_desc: This iconic red velvet cake is moist, tender, and has just a hint of chocolate flavor. The tangy cream cheese frosting perfectly complements the slightly cocoa-flavored cake. Perfect for birthdays, Valentine's Day, or any special occasion!

recipes.author: veggievictor
recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.short_desc: Hearty vegan curry with chickpeas and coconut milk
recipes.long_desc: This comforting chickpea curry is packed with plant-based protein and flavor. The creamy coconut milk balances the spices perfectly. Serve with rice or naan bread for a complete meal that's both nutritious and delicious!

recipes.author: bbqking
recipes.title: Smoked Brisket
recipes.short_desc: Texas-style smoked brisket with perfect bark
recipes.long_desc: This authentic Texas-style smoked brisket is cooked low and slow for maximum tenderness and flavor. The simple salt and pepper rub allows the quality of the meat to shine, while the smoking process creates that perfect bark crust. Be patient - good brisket takes time!

recipes.author: fitfoodie
recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.long_desc: This refreshing quinoa salad is packed with nutrients and flavor. The quinoa provides complete plant-based protein, while the fresh vegetables add crunch and vitamins. The lemon dressing keeps it light and bright. Perfect for meal prep or a quick healthy lunch!
